data.oai_dc:dc: Zip file contains 24 individual files, one for each pupa in Figure 2 (pupal IDs 1 - 24). Data are parts per million CO2 in air, with flow rate 300 ml per minute (STP) and measurements made at room temperature (21 - 23 degrees C). Although original data were sampled at 1 Hz, here they are uploaded at 0.5 Hz so that we produce files of reasonable size. Recording durations were 24 or 48 hours.
